name: Attack
summary: Make a weapon or unarmed attack.

name: Cast a Spell
summary: Cast a spell with casting time 1 action.

name: Dash
summary: Gain extra movement equal to your speed this turn.

name: Disengage
summary: Your movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks this turn.

name: Dodge
summary: Until next turn, attacks against you have disadvantage; Dex saves with advantage if you can see.

name: Help
summary: Grant an ally advantage on next ability check or attack vs a creature within 5 ft.

name: Hide
summary: Attempt to become hidden; requires cover/concealment.

name: Ready
summary: Prepare an action with a trigger; use reaction to execute.

name: Search
summary: Focus on finding something; DM chooses ability check.

name: Use an Object
summary: Interact with or activate an object requiring your action.

name: Grapple
summary: Athletics check vs target’s Athletics/Acrobatics; on success target is Grappled (speed 0).

name: Shove
summary: Athletics vs target’s Athletics/Acrobatics; on success push 5 ft or knock prone.
